titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Should you eat your catch? [videorecording / executive producer Phil Kavits ; produced by Stefan Dubert Productions.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Should you eat your catch? [videorecording / executive producer Phil Kavits ; produced by Stefan Dubert Productions.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Ann Arbor, Mich. : National Wildlife Federation, Great Lakes Natural Resource Center, c1989.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Title on container: Lake Michigan sport fish : should you eat your catch?

archdesc.scopecontent: Presents results of National Wildlife Federation study of toxic chemicals in sport fish and advice to limit consumption of Lake Michigan fish.
